name: Ignis Morty
description:
Ignis Morty is a fire-demon that lives in the fireplace of an old, gloomy house. Once in a while, the fire gets the hiccups and Ignis gets thrown out the fire. Help him find his way back!

Awesome soundeffects and music from Willians Rodrigues

Controls: Arrow Keys Left, Right and Up for JUMP.

If you press "Escape" in-game the game pauses but there is no message. Forgot it at the end. Just return with escape again.

A jump and run game by dahoon studios created for Ludum Dare 46.
